short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert links of all your active tabs to a single shortlink for easy sharing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How does it work?

1. You install the extension in Chrome
2. You click on the Welovelink icon in the address bar
3. You choose a title for your link list
4. You hit the big red button
5. Voil√†, that's done, all your tabs are stored in a link list with a short URL for easy sharing!
